bootcampAffiliateCouponForm.failedToGene:
**Functional Purpose**: Error message when coupon code generation fails
**UI Location**: Bootcamp Affiliate Coupon Form
**When Users See This**: After attempting to generate a coupon code and an error occurs
**Technical Context**: Displays when `fetchJSON` fails to generate a coupon code.
**Current English**: "Failed to generate coupon code. Please try again."
bootcampAffiliateCouponForm.bootcampAffi:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the Bootcamp Affiliate Coupon section
**UI Location**: Settings → Bootcamp Affiliate Coupon (section heading)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the settings page
**Technical Context**: Heading for the section where users can manage their bootcamp affiliate coupon.
**Current English**: "Bootcamp Affiliate Coupon"
bootcampAffiliateCouponForm.generatingCo:
**Functional Purpose**: Text for a button indicating that a coupon code is being generated
**UI Location**: Bootcamp Affiliate Coupon Form (button text)
**When Users See This**: While the system is actively generating an affiliate discount code after the user clicks the 'Generate' button
**Technical Context**: Appears on the button while `loading` state is true.
**Current English**: "Generating code..."
bootcampAffiliateCouponForm.generateYour:
**Functional Purpose**: Text for a button to initiate generation of an affiliate discount code
**UI Location**: Bootcamp Affiliate Coupon Form (button text)
**When Users See This**: When an affiliate discount code has not yet been generated
**Technical Context**: Appears on the button when `loading` state is false and no coupon code exists.
**Current English**: "Generate your Affiliate Discount code"
bootcampAffiliateCouponForm.affiliateCou:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the Affiliate Coupon section
**UI Location**: Bootcamp page (section heading)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the bootcamp information page
**Technical Context**: Heading for the affiliate coupon section on the bootcamp page.
**Current English**: "Affiliate Coupon"
bootcampAffiliateCouponForm.helpUsGetMor:
**Functional Purpose**: Explanatory text about the affiliate program benefits
**UI Location**: Bootcamp page, under Affiliate Coupon heading
**When Users See This**: When viewing information about the affiliate program
**Technical Context**: Provides details on how the affiliate code works, including discounts and revenue sharing.
**Current English**: "To help us get more people benefitting from the Bootcamp, we're giving you an Affiliate Code to share. Anyone using the code gets 20% off the Bootcamp, and we give you 20% of what they pay."
bootcampAffiliateCouponForm.pleaseShareA:
**Functional Purpose**: Instruction to share the affiliate code
**UI Location**: Bootcamp page, under Affiliate Coupon heading
**When Users See This**: After reading about the affiliate program benefits
**Technical Context**: Encourages users to share their code on social media and with contacts.
**Current English**: "Please share this Affiliate Code with your friends & colleagues, and on social media."
bootcampAffiliateCouponForm.pleaseHelpUs:
**Functional Purpose**: Encouragement to promote the bootcamp
**UI Location**: Settings → Bootcamp Affiliate Coupon (informational paragraph)
**When Users See This**: When an Insider views their affiliate coupon information
**Technical Context**: Further encourages sharing the affiliate code creatively.
**Current English**: "Please help us spread the word. Send this code to your friends, post it on social media. Maybe even print it out on postcards and put it through your neighbours doors?"
bootcampAffiliateCouponForm.youreEligibl:
**Functional Purpose**: Information for users eligible to join Insiders
**UI Location**: Settings → Bootcamp Affiliate Coupon (informational paragraph)
**When Users See This**: When a user's `insidersStatus` is 'eligible' or 'eligible_lifetime'
**Technical Context**: Informs the user they can join Insiders and provides a link to get started.
**Current English**: "You're eligible to join Insiders."
bootcampAffiliateCouponForm.getStartedHe:
**Functional Purpose**: Link text to start the Insiders program enrollment
**UI Location**: Settings → Bootcamp Affiliate Coupon (link)
**When Users See This**: When a user is eligible to join Insiders
**Technical Context**: Link to `insidersPath` to begin the Insiders enrollment process.
**Current English**: "Get started here"
